note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Methods, systems, or installations for draining-off sewage or storm water

CPC-specific-text.text: into a body of water
with disposal into the ground, e.g. via dry wells
via underground elongated vaulted elements
via box-shaped elements
Pneumatic sewage disposal systems; accessories specially adapted therefore
for public or main systems
Temporary fluid connections for emptying mobile sewage holding tanks, e.g. of trailers, boats

title-part.text: Arrangement of sewer pipe-lines or pipe-line systems
Pipes or fittings specially adapted to sewers

reference.text: manufacture of concrete tubes B28; pipes or pipe fittings in general F16L

CPC-specific-text.text: Partitioned to allow more than one medium to flow through
Open sewage channels

title-part.text: Methods of, or installations for, laying sewer pipes

CPC-specific-text.text: ; laying conduits in association with the digging of a trench E02F5/10; laying pipes in general F16L1/00
Refurbishing of sewer pipes, e.g. by coating, lining

title-part.text: Manhole shafts or other inspection chambers

reference.text: covers or frames for manholes or the like E02D29/14

CPC-specific-text.text: Connection of sewer pipes to manhole shaft
Partitioned to allow more than one medium to flow through
made of plastic material
provided with a liner
The bottom made of prefabricated segments
Sealing joints between manhole segments
inlets, road sinks, floor drains

title-part.text: with or without odour seals or sediment traps

CPC-specific-text.text: Gullies for use in roads or pavements
provided with flushing means for cleaning or emptying
with a sediment trap
with a permanent or temporary filtering device; Filtering devices specially adapted therefor
with an odour seal
the odour seal being easily accessible for cleaning
Floor drains for indoor use
specially adapted for showers
Devices for preventing seepage around the floor drain
Accessories therefor
Devices for temporarily blocking inflow into a gully
with means for adjusting their position with respect to the surrounding surface
for height adjustment
for inclination adjustment
for horizontal position adjustment
with an odour seal
in the form of a valve
in the form of a bell siphon

title-part.text: Arrangements of means against overflow of water, backing-up from the drain
adapted to be used with kerbs

CPC-specific-text.text: draining of roads E01F
hinged to the body of the gully
with slidable or rotatable locking elements
with elastic locking elements
with means for protecting against vandalism
with means for enhancing water flow
Dedicated additional structures, interposed or parallel to the sewer system
using already existing parts of the sewer system for runoff-regulation
Naturals or landscape retention bodies, e.g. ponds
Accessories, e.g. flow regulators or cleaning devices
Passive flow control devices, i.e. not moving during flow regulation
Active flow control devices, i.e. moving during flow regulation
Cleaning devices providing a flushing surge
providing screening of overflowing water

title-part.text: Devices for separating liquid or solid substances from sewage, e.g. sand or sludge traps, rakes or grates

reference.text: for use in sewage purification plants or both in sewage purification plants or in sewer systems B01D, C02F

CPC-specific-text.text: ; gullies with sediment traps E03F5/04

title-part.text: Devices for separating oil, water or grease from sewage in drains leading to the main sewer
Tanks for disinfecting, neutralising, or cooling sewage

reference.text: arrangements in tanks as to the biological or chemical aspect C02F
for connections of baths, basins, or the like E03C1/12

CPC-specific-text.text: ; siphons in dams E02B7/18

title-part.text: Adaptations of pumping plants for lifting sewage

reference.text: wheeled apparatus for emptying sewers or cesspools E03F7/10; pumps, pumping plants, per se F04

title-part.text: Installations for neutralising explosions in sewers

reference.text: in tanks B65D90/38; security devices against the effect of explosions for manhole covers E02D29/14
disintegrating garbage to be evacuated with sewage B02C18/0084; devices on water-closet bowls E03D

title-part.text: Other installations or implements for operating sewer systems, e.g. for preventing or indicating stoppage

reference.text: in gullies, drains or the like E03F5/042

title-part.text: Devices for restraining rats or other animals
Hand implements for emptying sewers or cesspools
Wheeled apparatus for emptying sewers or cesspools

CPC-specific-text.text: with a tank featuring one or more partition walls
Accessories, e.g. hose support

title-part.text: Installations enabling inspection personnel to drive along sewer canals

CPC-specific-text.text: methods or devices
or clearing

reference.text: sediment traps, rakes, screens, or the like, arranged in sewer lines E03F5/14; cleaning pipes in general, devices for cleaning pipes B08B9/02

CPC-specific-text.text: ; gullies provided with flushing means for cleaning or emptying E03F5/0402; devices to remove obstructions in waste-pipes or sinks E03C1/30
Cleaning sewer pipes by mechanical means
Apparatus for simultaneously pushing and rotating a cleaning device carried by the leading end of a cable or an assembly of rods
Devices providing a flushing surge

reference.text: emptying cesspools E03F7/00; features relating to treatment of sewage C02F

title-part.text: Details, devices or methods not otherwise provided for
Dividing the first rain flush out of the stormwater flow
Devices providing a sequential discharge in sewer systems
Means for indicating blockage in sewer systems
